AddGroupMember.document: This example shows you how to add users to a group.
AddGroupMember.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddGroupMember
<Common request parameters>

{
    "GroupId": "abcdfdfg",
    "SdkAppId": 12345678,
    "MemberIds": [
        "dfgdfg"
    ]
}
AddGroupMember.title: Add users to a group

BatchAddGroupMember.document: This example shows you how to add users to multiple groups.
BatchAddGroupMember.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BatchAddGroupMember
<Common request parameters>

{
    "GroupIds": [
        "abcdfdfg",
        "dfgsdgsdg"
    ],
    "SdkAppId": 12345678,
    "MemberIds": [
        "dfgdfg"
    ]
}
BatchAddGroupMember.title: Adding users to multiple groups

BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.document: This example shows you how to create multiple groups.
BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.title: Creating multiple groups

BatchCreateRoom.document: This example shows you how to create multiple classrooms at a time.
BatchCreateRoom.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BatchCreateRoom
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1,
    "RoomInfos": [
        {
            "Name": "abc",
            "StartTime": 1,
            "EndTime": 1,
            "TeacherId": "abc",
            "Resolution": 1,
            "MaxMicNumber": 1,
            "AutoMic": 1,
            "TurnOffMic": 1,
            "AudioQuality": 1,
            "SubType": "abc",
            "DisableRecord": 1,
            "Assistants": [
                "abc"
            ],
            "RTCAudienceNumber": 1,
            "AudienceType": 1,
            "RecordLayout": 1,
            "GroupId": "abc",
            "EnableDirectControl": 1
        }
    ]
}
BatchCreateRoom.title: Creating multiple classrooms at a time

}

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 123,
    "CustomContent": [
        {
            "Scene": "default",
            "LogoUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/logo.png",
            "HomeUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/login",
            "JsUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.js",
            "CssUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.css"

    ]
}
